required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate Safety and Tolerability of SH3765 Tablet in Patients With Advanced Malignant Tumor
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-Label Study to Determine Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics (PK) and Preliminary Efficacy of SH3765 Tablet in Patients With Advanced Malignant Tumor

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective is to determine the safety and tolerability of SH3765 in subjects with advanced malignant tumor by determining the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and recommended Phase 2 dose (RP2D). The second objective is to evaluate the PK profile and preliminary efficacy of SH3765 in subjects with advanced malignant tumor.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a Phase I, open-label, multicenter, multidose, two-part study to assess the safety, tolerability, PK and preliminary efficacy of SH3765, a protein arginine methyltransferase 5 (PRMT5) inhibitor, in subjects with advanced malignant tumor including but not limited to solid tumor and non-Hodgkin lymphoma.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 28 days of consecutive treatment
primary_outcome.description: DLT is defined as an adverse event that meets protocol defined DLT criteria occurring from the first dose to the end of cycle 1 of multiple doses, except those unequivocally due to the underlying malignancy or an extraneous cause.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 28 days of consecutive treatment
primary_outcome.description: MTD was defined as the highest dose at which DLT occurred in less than one-third of subjects during the DLT observation period.

secondary_outcome.description: Highest observed plasma concentration of SH3765
Time of highest observed plasma concentration of SH3765
Area under the plasma concentration time curve of SH3765
The average residence time in body of SH3765

arm_group.description: Daily oral administration of SH3765 tablet

intervention.description: Starting dose 2.5mg, oral administered once daily. If tolerated subsequent cohorts will test increasing doses (5mg, 10mg, 15mg, 20mg, 25mg, 30mg) of SH3765.
